summary: This mods adds 9 spell tomes that give the blessings of the divines.
descriptionHtml:
No longer do you need an alter to pray to a divine with these tomes the divines can hear your prayers from anywhere in Skyrim.

COST: 100 base magicka

Where: These tomes are found in the Temple of the Divines in Solitude in front of their respective shrines. Because it is in a building you do have to steal them. If anyone knows how to fix this please message me.

As per a request I added the three blessings of Mephala, Boethiah and Azura spell tomes in Raven Rock Temple.

Instillation: Just drag the esp file into you data folder or use the NMM.

Problems:
Any mod that changes the timer of the divines. The other mod's timer will apply for alters but will not apply to my tomes which will stay at 8 hours. This because praying at an alter is much more effective then praying out in the wild, which is also why I implemented a small magicka cost.

Please download the second file as that is one that changes it to the temple of the divines. If you do not wish to steal the tomes download the first file which puts them beside the smelter at Warmaiden's in Whiterun.
author: James Ellis-Trenholm
